an10.122:4.1: “Mendicants, these ten things, when developed and cultivated, lead to the ending of defilements.
an10.122:4.3: Right view, right motivation, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right mindfulness, right samādhi, right knowledge, and right freedom.
an10.122:4.4: These ten things, when developed and cultivated, lead to the ending of defilements.”
